Nov. 25, 1979 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (2nd Section)

De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK 1st Prize £75 & George Bowley Challenge Trophy 2nd Prize £50 & Othello Cup £rd Prize £35 & C.A. Anderson Cup. 9 bands competed.
